CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(ccrz__OrderStatus__c,'Order Submitted') || (NOT(ISNULL(EC_Submission_Failure_Count__c)) && EC_Submission_Failure_Count__c < 5 && ISPICKVAL(ccrz__OrderStatus__c,'Failed')),'In Progress',IF( NOT(ISNULL(EC_Submission_Failure_Count__c)) && EC_Submission_Failure_Count__c >=5 && ISPICKVAL(ccrz__OrderStatus__c,'Failed'),'Submitted', IF(ISPICKVAL(ccrz__OrderStatus__c,'Pending'), 'Confirmed', TEXT(ccrz__OrderStatus__c))))
CustomField.label: Customer Order Status
